name: Lecto
description:
You awaken bound on a mysterious boat. The only thing you know is that you must get out. 

A mysterious creature offers its help. Can it be trusted? 

What's that noise?!

Why are you dressed like that, you cannot remember. Is it Christmas? 

Made with Love by Team Book Club:

  • dill0wn - code + design (twitter)
  • Shawna - art + design + original concept
  • Lucas - story + design
  • Samantha - UI + PM
